data.enText: a series of rulers of a country who all belong to the same family
a period of years during which members of a particular family rule a country

simple_means.memory_skill: dynast 君主 + y 表名词 → 王朝

tr: a sequence of powerful leaders in the same family

value.def: A dynasty is a series of rulers of a country who all belong to the same family.

example.ex: The Seljuk dynasty of Syria was founded in 1094.
example.tran: 叙利亚的塞尔柱王朝始建于 1094 年。

value.def: A dynasty is a period of time during which a country is ruled by members of the same family.

example.ex: ...carvings dating back to the Ming dynasty.
example.tran: 可以追溯到明朝的雕刻

value.def: A dynasty is a family which has members from two or more generations who are important in a particular field of activity, for example in business or politics.
value.tran: 王朝(指同一家族在某领域，如政界或商界，有两代以上的重要领袖或权威人物)

trans: 贡榜王朝；贡榜第三帝国

partsOfSpeech.dec: dynam 力量 + ics …学 → 力量学 → 动力学
dynam 力量 + ite 表名词 → 产生力量的物品 → 炸药
dyn 力量 + ast 表人 → 掌权的人 → 君主
dynast 君主 + y 表名词 → 王朝
